body_html:
I'm not exactly sure what you mean by "standalone c++" build, but I assume independent of TensorFlow tooling is wha tyou mean.

There is already a makefile that builds basically just the interpreter that @petewarden made. You may need to modify the ops to be driven by the "reference ops" rather than the "optimized ops" to avoid using neon. But this should be definitely possible, and something we hope to support better in the future.

body:
I'm not exactly sure what you mean by "standalone c++" build, but I assume independent of TensorFlow tooling is wha tyou mean.

There is already a makefile that builds basically just the interpreter that @petewarden made. You may need to modify the ops to be driven by the "reference ops" rather than the "optimized ops" to avoid using neon. But this should be definitely possible, and something we hope to support better in the future.
